Package duke.task

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • duke.task.Task
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Deadline, Event, Todo
    public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a task. The abstract 'Task' class supports operator (i) toString that returns the string representation of task.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Task

        public Task​(java.lang.String description)
        Initialises a new instance od a task. Used for when user inputs event task directly to the chatbot.
        Parameters:
        description - Description of task

      • Task

        public Task​(java.lang.String isDone,
            java.lang.String description)
        Initialises a new instance oft task. Used for loading the tasks form text file to TaskList.
        Parameters:
        isDone - 0 or 1 representation of whether a task is done.
        description - Description of task.

        Returns a string representing whether task is done.
        Returns:
